title: libxcb missing xproto dependency
body:
```
[spackapps@lo-login-02 bin]$ spack info libxcb
AutotoolsPackage:    libxcb
Homepage:            https://xcb.freedesktop.org/

Safe versions:  
    1.12      https://xcb.freedesktop.org/dist/libxcb-1.12.tar.gz
    1.11.1    https://xcb.freedesktop.org/dist/libxcb-1.11.1.tar.gz
    1.11      https://xcb.freedesktop.org/dist/libxcb-1.11.tar.gz

Variants:
    None

Installation Phases:
    autoreconf    configure    build    install

Build Dependencies:
    libpthread-stubs  libxau  libxdmcp  pkg-config  util-macros  xcb-proto

Link Dependencies:
    libpthread-stubs  libxau  libxdmcp

Run Dependencies:
    None

Virtual Packages: 
    None

Description:
    The X protocol C-language Binding (XCB) is a replacement for Xlib
    featuring a small footprint, latency hiding, direct access to the
    protocol, improved threading support, and extensibility.
```

Config.log complains about not finding xproto:

```
Package 'xproto', required by 'xau', not found
configure:19699: $? = 1
configure:19713: result: no
Package 'xproto', required by 'xau', not found
configure:19729: error: Package requirements (pthread-stubs xau >= 0.99.2) were not met:
```
